Pip Freedman (14 Julaị 1925 - 19 Mee 2003) bụ onye na-eme ihe ọchị na redio na South Africa na onye na-emepụta ihe nkiri ma bụrụ onye a maara nke ọma maka arụmọrụ ya na SABC's Springbok Radio na ihe ngosi ahụ, The Pip Freedmann Show
Ọrụ ya, malite na 1950s, were afọ iri isii ruo 2002.
A mụrụ ya Philip Maurice Freedman na Swellendam, Cape Province na 1925.  Ọ lụrụ nwanyị ugboro abụọ

Ọ zutere nwunye ya nke abụọ Pat na 1967 wee lụọ ya na 1973. O nwere ụmụ abụọ site n'aka nwunye mbụ ya Jeremy na Gayle Freedman na Jonathan na Samantha Freedman site n'aka nwunye ya nke abụọ, Pat. Ọ nwụrụ na Life Kingsbury Hospital, Cape Town site na ọbara na-akpụ akpụ n'ụkwụ ya.
Ọ malitere ọrụ ya na Starlight Theatre na Sea Point, Cape Town

Ọ sonyere SABC n'afọ ndị 1950s. Cecile Whiteman kpọbatara ya ma dochie Gabriel Bauman na ihe ngosi ahụ, Snoektown Calling Ọ ga-eme ihe ngosi redio Next Stop Makouvlei site na 1969 ruo 1972, ihe ngosi nke Pieter van der Bijl mepụtara na nke a gbanwere ka ọ bụrụ ihe nkiri nke otu aha ahụ
Ihe ngosi redio nke ya bụ The Pip Freedman Show, nke a na-agbasa na Springbok Radio site na Jenụwarị 1968 ruo 1985 mgbe ụlọ ọrụ redio mechiri maka oge ikpeazụ
N'ime ihe ngosi ahụ, ọ ga-ewepụ omume, ọchị na olu nke agbụrụ dị iche iche nke Western Cape n'ejighị mkparị ma ọ bụ enweghị nkwanye ùgwù.
